thread.title: WATCH: Mike Francesa's top 5 anti-Mets rants on WFAN
thread.title_full: WATCH: Mike Francesa's top 5 anti-Mets rants on WFAN | NJ.com

author: John Shabe | NJ Advance Media
title: WATCH: Mike Francesa's top 5 anti-Mets rants on WFAN
text:
The Mets are finally in the playoffs .
It's the moment Mets' fans have waited for since Carlos Beltran watched Adam Wainwright's curve go by with the bases loaded in the 2006 NLCS.
Since then, Mets fans have endured some bad baseball, a fact that New York sports talker (and Yankees fan) Mike Francesa seemed to revel in on many summer afternoons on WFAN.
We reviewed video of Francesa's anti-Mets takes and came up with this top 5 list of The Pope's most scathing anti-Mets rants. As you hear about the misdeeds of Jerry Hairston, Jr. , Tim Byrdak , Jordany Valdespin and countless other Mets, consider how far the Mets have come since the darkest of the dark days.
Did we miss a good Francesa rant? Post it in comments.
